event.description: Drew Stubbs pops out to second baseman Jason Donald.
Zack Cozart singles on a ground ball to third baseman Jack Hannahan.
Chris Heisey walks. Zack Cozart to 2nd.
Todd Frazier reaches on fielding error by first baseman Russ Canzler. Zack Cozart to 3rd. Chris Heisey to 2nd.

Miguel Cairo singles on a soft fly ball to right fielder Aaron Cunningham. Zack Cozart scores. Chris Heisey scores. Miguel Cairo to 2nd. Todd Frazier advances to 3rd, on throwing error by right fielder Aaron Cunningham.
Wilson Valdez singles on a ground ball to pitcher Ubaldo Jimenez. Todd Frazier scores. Miguel Cairo to 3rd.
With Ryan Hanigan batting, Wilson Valdez steals (1) 2nd base.
Ryan Hanigan strikes out swinging.
Willie Harris singles on a line drive to right fielder Aaron Cunningham. Miguel Cairo scores. Wilson Valdez scores.
Henry Rodriguez singles on a ground ball to right fielder Aaron Cunningham. Willie Harris to 2nd.
Drew Stubbs grounds into a force out, shortstop Cristian Guzman to second baseman Jason Donald. Henry Rodriguez out at 2nd.
Pitcher Change: Josh Tomlin replaces Ubaldo Jimenez.
Zack Cozart hits a ground-rule double (1) on a fly ball to center field.
Chris Heisey called out on strikes.
Todd Frazier strikes out swinging.
Miguel Cairo grounds out, third baseman Jack Hannahan to first baseman Russ Canzler.
Wilson Valdez singles on a ground ball to center fielder Ezequiel Carrera.
Ryan Hanigan grounds into double play, shortstop Cristian Guzman to second baseman Jason Donald to first baseman Russ Canzler. Wilson Valdez out at 2nd.
Willie Harris grounds out, second baseman Jason Donald to first baseman Russ Canzler.
Pitcher Change: Joe Smith replaces Josh Tomlin.
Henry Rodriguez walks.
Drew Stubbs doubles (1) on a fly ball to center fielder Ezequiel Carrera. Henry Rodriguez scores.
Zack Cozart called out on strikes.
Chris Heisey pops out to second baseman Jason Donald.
Todd Frazier reaches on fielding error by shortstop Cristian Guzman. Drew Stubbs to 3rd.
Miguel Cairo doubles (1) on a fly ball to right fielder Aaron Cunningham. Drew Stubbs scores. Todd Frazier to 3rd.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Kristopher Negron replaces Wilson Valdez.
Kristopher Negron grounds out, third baseman Jack Hannahan to first baseman Russ Canzler.
Pitcher Change: Chris Ray replaces Joe Smith.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Dioner Navarro replaces Ryan Hanigan.
Dioner Navarro grounds out, third baseman Jack Hannahan to first baseman Russ Canzler.
Willie Harris grounds out, first baseman Russ Canzler to pitcher Chris Ray.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Tucker Barnhart replaces Henry Rodriguez.
Tucker Barnhart called out on strikes.
Defensive Substitution: Matt Pagnozzi replaces catcher Lou Marson, batting 9th, playing catcher.
Pitcher Change: Jeanmar Gomez replaces Chris Ray.
Denis Phipps flies out to right fielder Aaron Cunningham.
Didi Gregorius called out on strikes.
Daryl Jones grounds out to first baseman Russ Canzler.
Trevor Crowe remains in the game as the center fielder.
Juan Diaz remains in the game as the shortstop.
Defensive Substitution: Fred Lewis replaces first baseman Russ Canzler, batting 3rd, playing left field.
Defensive switch from left field to first base for Shelley Duncan.
Defensive Substitution: Felix Pie replaces right fielder Aaron Cunningham, batting 5th, playing right field.
Defensive Substitution: Jose Lopez replaces second baseman Jason Donald, batting 7th, playing second base.
Andy LaRoche remains in the game as the third baseman.
Neftali Soto strikes out swinging.
Paul Janish grounds out, third baseman Andy LaRoche to first baseman Shelley Duncan.
Kristopher Negron strikes out swinging.
Pitcher Change: Rob Bryson replaces Jeanmar Gomez.
Dioner Navarro homers (1) on a fly ball to right field.
Donald Lutz singles on a soft line drive to left fielder Fred Lewis.
Donald Lutz out at 2nd, catcher Matt Pagnozzi to shortstop Juan Diaz.
Tucker Barnhart flies out to center fielder Trevor Crowe.
Denis Phipps doubles (1) on a soft fly ball to right fielder Felix Pie.
Didi Gregorius flies out to center fielder Trevor Crowe.
Nick Weglarz remains in the game as the designated hitter.
Pitcher Change: Hector Ambriz replaces Rob Bryson.
Daryl Jones singles on a line drive to left fielder Fred Lewis.
Neftali Soto grounds into a force out, third baseman Andy LaRoche to second baseman Jose Lopez. Daryl Jones out at 2nd. Neftali Soto to 1st.
Paul Janish grounds into a force out, shortstop Juan Diaz to second baseman Jose Lopez. Neftali Soto out at 2nd. Paul Janish to 1st.
Kristopher Negron pops out to second baseman Jose Lopez.
Ezequiel Carrera strikes out swinging.
Cristian Guzman walks.
Russ Canzler singles on a line drive to right fielder Willie Harris. Cristian Guzman to 2nd.
Shelley Duncan homers (1) on a fly ball to left field. Cristian Guzman scores. Russ Canzler scores.
Aaron Cunningham grounds out, third baseman Miguel Cairo to first baseman Todd Frazier.
Matt LaPorta strikes out swinging.
Jason Donald grounds out, second baseman Wilson Valdez to first baseman Todd Frazier.
Jack Hannahan singles on a ground ball to right fielder Willie Harris.
Lou Marson singles on a line drive to right fielder Willie Harris. Jack Hannahan to 2nd.
Ezequiel Carrera grounds into double play, second baseman Wilson Valdez to first baseman Todd Frazier. Lou Marson out at 2nd.
Pitcher Change: Aroldis Chapman replaces Homer Bailey.
Cristian Guzman singles on a line drive to right fielder Willie Harris.
Russ Canzler walks. Cristian Guzman to 2nd.
Shelley Duncan strikes out swinging.
With Aaron Cunningham batting, Cristian Guzman steals (1) 3rd base. Russ Canzler steals (1) 2nd base.
Aaron Cunningham grounds out, shortstop Zack Cozart to first baseman Todd Frazier. Cristian Guzman scores.
Matt LaPorta strikes out swinging.

Kristopher Negron remains in the game as the second baseman.
Jason Donald flies out to right fielder Willie Harris.
Jack Hannahan strikes out swinging.
Lou Marson singles on a soft ground ball to catcher Ryan Hanigan.
With Ezequiel Carrera batting, Lou Marson picked off and caught stealing 2nd base, pitcher Aroldis Chapman to first baseman Todd Frazier to shortstop Didi Gregorius.
Dioner Navarro remains in the game as the catcher.
Tucker Barnhart remains in the game as the designated hitter.
Pitcher Change: Sean Marshall replaces Aroldis Chapman.
Ezequiel Carrera hit by pitch.
Cristian Guzman grounds out, third baseman Miguel Cairo to first baseman Todd Frazier. Ezequiel Carrera to 2nd.
Russ Canzler singles on a line drive to center fielder Denis Phipps. Ezequiel Carrera scores.
Shelley Duncan walks. Russ Canzler to 2nd.
Aaron Cunningham singles on a line drive to center fielder Denis Phipps, deflected by shortstop Didi Gregorius. Russ Canzler to 3rd. Shelley Duncan to 2nd.
Matt LaPorta grounds into a force out, third baseman Miguel Cairo to second baseman Kristopher Negron. Russ Canzler scores. Shelley Duncan to 3rd. Aaron Cunningham out at 2nd. Matt LaPorta to 1st.
Jason Donald lines out to center fielder Denis Phipps.
Defensive Substitution: Neftali Soto replaces first baseman Todd Frazier, batting 4th, playing first base.
Defensive Substitution: Paul Janish replaces third baseman Miguel Cairo, batting 5th, playing third base.
Pitcher Change: Carlos Fisher replaces Sean Marshall.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Andy LaRoche replaces Jack Hannahan.
Andy LaRoche singles on a line drive to right fielder Willie Harris.
Matt Pagnozzi strikes out swinging.

Offensive Substitution: Pinch hitter Juan Diaz replaces Cristian Guzman.

Juan Diaz called out on strikes.

Fred Lewis walks.
Shelley Duncan grounds into double play, shortstop Didi Gregorius to second baseman Kristopher Negron to first baseman Neftali Soto. Fred Lewis out at 2nd.
